title: How to learn Angular
content: Angular (commonly referred to as Angular 2 or Angular CLI) is a TypeScript-based free and open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations. Angular is a complete rewrite from the same team that built AngularJS. Angular is used as the frontend of the MEAN stack, consisting of MongoDB database, Express.js web application server framework, Angular itself (or AngularJS), and Node.js server runtime environment.
author: Het Savaliya
metadesc: Learn angular in few minutes. I will teach you angular in few minutes
